website_summaries.verdict: A wooden deer call that won't freeze up in extreme temperatures and produces realistic sounds that attract different types of deer.
pros: Makes clear, realistic buck, doe, and fawn sounds like grunts and bleats
Effective at attracting mule and white tail deer
Even works well in harsh weather
cons: Although customers love the cherry wood construction, rare cases of it developing cracks have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend so he can go out into the woods and do something other than jerk off. Hope he doesnt get shot by a hunter. Just kidding, i hope he does. Its cool that it came with directions on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... deer hunting so I bought this based on the good reviews. My husband was very impressed with it ...
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about deer hunting so I bought this based on the good reviews. My husband was very impressed with it and has been showing it to his friends and giving me credit for picking out a great caller. Thanks to Amazon for making me look good!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C. Stricklan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: The sound of the call is good, easy to figure out. But, where as both pieces are wooden it is far to tight to pull apart and it cracked the very first time I put it back together. I taped it back together and it works fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the hubby just to wet his hunting ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I played with this all afternoon. Lol. The kids thought we were nuts. Great gift for the hubby just to wet his hunting whistle before the season starts. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jill

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me for my birthday. I have played around with it a lot, and it really sounds like a deer grunting. The adjustment works well, but it is a little difficult to access. I've taken it hunting a few times, but haven't had an opportunity to use it yet. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: ach

customer_reviews.title: a beautiful call but is already getting loose at the top ...
customer_reviews.text: a beautiful call but is already getting loose at the top & bottom joint; you have to twist the call apart to set the different calls; can see the call not staying together after several seasons of use;
customer_reviews.author: DA LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Scary sounds!  Does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: This scared the deer. No matter where I set the band up and whether it was a doe or buck or fawn, this caused nothing but white tails scattering and I have been using calls and hunting for 2 decades.
customer_reviews.author: SAFARIPOLICE

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sounding call. Did not freeze up. Worth the buy. Looking forward to many years in using this call. Call does work well calling in deer of either sex.
customer_reviews.author: RPS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got a deer the times I have used it. Will use again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Slaba

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift for a young hunter and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: bme34

customer_reviews.title: Great call
customer_reviews.text: Works great. If I lose it I will buy another one
customer_reviews.author: JGrey

customer_reviews.title: Great tone and vocal range
customer_reviews.text: Very great tone and vocal range on this call. I also have the extinguisher (not knocking it at all) but I like this call better because you are able to get a higher pitch for fawn bleat with this one than the extinguisher. Buck grunt range can also go deeper/lower than extinguisher. No complaints at all. Smooth call.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the husband and he loves it. It does what it says and he has fun playing with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Powers

customer_reviews.title: Terrific gift for my husband!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my husband and he absolutely LOVED it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yep. It’s a call
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the rut. Used out in the field and it sounds great
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice but won't work in the woods.  Sorry Nationwide Scents, not a quality deer call!
customer_reviews.text: I have been hunting whitetail deer for over 30 years in the Midwest. I have heard countless grunts from rutting bucks and this call doesn't come close to mimicking a buck grunt. Don't be fooled by it's looks, this product will not work. It will scare off some deer, but won't work to call in a nice buck!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works great for calling bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at the recommendation of a co-worker. Once it was delivered by husband asked me to get him one because he liked it so much. I was able to call in a buck during the rut with it, and unlike my husband's old call, the cold weather didn't affect the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle V.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I use this call, I called in my 12 pointer which I shot this year! Within two minutes of me grunting. He came in head up slow trot looking to see what was making the call!
customer_reviews.author: Scott w Busse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice call
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice call, love the wood feel. Sound quality is very good and it’s easy to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple full range of tones
customer_reviews.text: Great tomes from wood. Easy to change the tones also.
customer_reviews.author: ChongLussier

customer_reviews.title: Should Do The Trick!
customer_reviews.text: While my hunt isn't until November, I have been practicing and making my wife and kids insane with my calls. This should do the trick come time for the rut.
customer_reviews.author: JoeRay Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vary good quality!! Surprised me I now own two of them they sound great
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: High quality grunt call.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. He hasn't used in the field yet but I do like the sound. nice quality of wood. very nice craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Congdon

customer_reviews.title: REAL SOUNDS!
customer_reviews.text: This is as realistic sounding grunt tube as you'll find.
customer_reviews.author: rob122hunting

customer_reviews.title: Most realistic call bar none
customer_reviews.text: This is the most realistic sounding call I have ever used easy to manipulate to create whatever sound you want great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Shopping from home is essential
customer_reviews.text: Love it's wooden construction and craftsmanship. I'll use it for hunting starting now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. McClain, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It broke down middle trying to adjust sounds. The grunt isn't very realistic. Definitely not worth price for it
customer_reviews.author: Travis Dryden

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Wood split, within 5 minutes of me having it, just trying to adjust the sound.
customer_reviews.author: logan t

customer_reviews.title: It was here in no time at all
customer_reviews.text: It was here quickly and its perfect for my sons gift this year.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I really like the natural wood
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I really like the natural wood, great adjustable reed that won't miss call. Fantastic results.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Z.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Nationwide Scents for another great product. Can't wait to put it to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my Nationwide Scents grunt call in today! All I can say is WoW! The sound and Craftsmanship of this call is top notch. Thanks Nationwide Scents for another great product. Can't wait to put it to use on the hit lister this year.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Quality built!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent call, better then those cheap plastic ones. Quality built and the sound is great! And results show!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Maki

product_meta.title: Nationwide Scents All in One Deer Hunting Wooden Cherry Grunt Call, Buck Tube, Estrus Doe in Heat Call and Fawn Bleats
feature_bullets: Nationwide Scents Deer grunt call is proven in the field and backed by Nationwide Scents team of 28 years of experience hunting and raising whitetail deer.
Custom made hunting accessories with an extra-long tube for volume and realistic throaty grunts. Laser engraved for a perfect sounding call you can be proud of to hang on your neck!

Deer grunt call is designed to mimic a rutting buck grunt, young buck call, breeding buck, estrus doe bleat, regular doe bleat and fawn bleat with easy to adjust ring on the reed and easy to adjust low – high volume calling.
Deer grunt call can do loud to gentle calling by the flick of your wrist covering small or large hole with a freeze proof tip for the harshest conditions.

LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK: We know that you are going to love our deer call because of its great features. However, if for any reason you are unsatisfied, please contact us for a hassle free refund or replacement.
